title: Serif and script logo
content:
Hi gang,

any ideas on this \*wonderful\* logo? i feel the serif is really simple, but it's killing me. I'm terrible at script IDs. Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [top.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012122201/http:/typophile.com/files/top.jpg) | 4.79 KB |
author: Chipman223

comments.content: Thx jan, probably why it looked so familiar. reminds me of harry potter type.

You’re welcome.  
I think the script is [Amazone](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012122201/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/amazone/).
